name: MyFirstGame (QuanMCPC)
description:
this is my very first game created in unity.

i created the game because i want to test if i could make a game after i escaped from the tutorial hell.

because this is my first time creating a game, the game currently look like a Scheiße, and i want to keep it that way, cause i'm lazy.

but of course, you're not going to download and play this game, will you? hm? HMMM???

source code available on github: https://github.com/QuanMCPC/MyFirstGame
